name: Endless Crawler
description:
Once in an underground laboratory, the protagonist of another story about underground adventures, this time armed with an automatic rifle and lack of fear, cleans the entire laboratory of experimental monsters from room to room.

Endless Crawler - Top Down Shooter with elements of the Roguelike genre, where the player explores underground levels, destroys hordes of monsters, goes world after world and unlocks improvements that will help him on further adventures.

Features of the game:
- Complexity
- Pixel Art
- Endless World
